name: Erebus, Child of Chaos
description:
Defend the world against the wraith of the evil wizard twins! maintain control as they send waves of confusing energy from their towers that scramble your motor functions! Collect riches as you protect yourself from an onslaught of minions and monsters!

Font: F5.6-Regular

https://opensourcefonts.com/fonts/13033/f5.6.html

Background music: Apex by Bio Unit

https://www.freemusicarchive.org/music/Bio_Unit/Malfunction/Apex_1252
